outputs.output_descr: 1) To expand the coverage of the national integrated network for civil registration established by the General Agency for State Registration to include 21 aimags and 9 capital city districts; 2) To create a computerized database of citizens' addresses to allow timely registration and access to public services, employment opportunities especially by vulnerable and poor segments of population, for updating voter's lists as well as to serve as basis for MDG monitoring; 3) To enhance access to the civil registration database by concerned ministries and government agencies at all levels for better planning, MDG monitoring and coordination; 4) To enhance capacity of relevant staff in data management

project_descr: National Integrated Database for Civil Registration
